Html: Would it be possible to add a hunter pet's Ferocious Inspiration to the mage model in the buffs panel? Maybe use an average crit rate for a typical raiding hunter pet.

I tried to add it to the buffcache.xml file, but to no avail. So I went digging in the source code, and found the buffs were hardcoded into rawr.exe. I would add it, and recompile, but i don't have the necessary software.
A default set of buffs is hard-coded into the app. It will indeed use additional/changed buffs from your Buffcache.xml as well. I'll see about getting this added.
